entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Resolution
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Resolution Airport 8:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -30.8°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -34.0°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
